text: Chithrakoodam is a 2003 Indian Malayalam film, directed by MS Pradeep Kumar, starring Abhinay and Jagadish in the lead role. ==Cast== * Innocent * Sindhu * Abhinay * Jagadish * Kalabhavan Narayanankutty * Karthikeyan Nair * Lakshmi Krishnamoorthy * Mala Aravindan * Prasanth * Silja * Rajesh ==References== ==External links== * Category:2003 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Chithrakoodam
